backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, dance classes, sessions, bookings, video lessons, contact inquiries, and authorization checks with AccessControl.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files used for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables, light/dark mode tokens, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with TanStack Router routes, layout, authentication logic, profile setup dialog, and booking reminders.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen shown when a user lacks required permissions, with a return-home button.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with query cache clearing and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog for first-time user profile creation with form validation and React Query mutation.
frontend/src/components/auth/Registratio: Registration form that saves a user profile via mutation, validates input, and triggers success or error toasts.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleGate.ts: Role-based access wrapper that loads the user role and only allows admins to view protected content.
frontend/src/components/bookings/Booking: Button that triggers a booking mutation, prompting login if needed and showing success or error toasts.
Per-booking reminder checker that periodically notifies users when a session is approaching based on stored settings.
Manager that periodically processes all user bookings and their reminder settings, placeholder for full reminder logic.
frontend/src/components/classes/ClassEdi: Dialog for creating a new dance class with form fields, validation, and submission via mutation.
frontend/src/components/instructor/Sessi: Static panel prompting instructors to select a session to view its roster.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Footer showing site links, branding, and instructor contact details with a profile image.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Navigation header that shows links and actions based on authentication, user role, and mobile menu state.
frontend/src/components/lessons/LessonEd: Dialog form for creating and uploading a new video lesson with fields for metadata and validations.
frontend/src/components/payments/PayForB: Button that creates a Stripe checkout session for a booking and redirects the user to payment.
frontend/src/components/sessions/Session: Dialog form for scheduling a new class session by selecting a class and entering time, capacity, and location.
frontend/src/constants/classLevels.ts: Defines available class levels and exports their TypeScript type.
frontend/src/constants/danceStyles.ts: Defines supported dance styles and exports their TypeScript type.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookingDetails.ts: Hook that fetches and combines session and class details for a given booking.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookingReminderSet: Hook for storing and updating per‑booking reminder settings in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerRole.ts: Hooks to fetch the caller’s user role and check admin status via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Hook that retrieves the current user's profile using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating dance classes, sessions, bookings, video lessons, users, contact inquiries, and Stripe configuration via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useStripeCheckout.ts: Defines mutations to create Stripe checkout sessions and fetch their status through the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom OKLCH design tokens, dark mode variables, and global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInquiriesP: Displays, sorts, and manages contact inquiries with loading and error states in the admin dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRegistrati: Admin page for listing all registered users with roles, principal IDs, and error/loading handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRoleManage: Allows admins to view their role and assign roles to users by Principal ID.
frontend/src/pages/admin/PaymentSetupPag: Admin interface for viewing and configuring Stripe payment settings, including secret key and allowed countries.
frontend/src/pages/auth/RegisterPage.tsx: Handles login via Internet Identity and shows registration form or completion screens depending on authentication and profile state.
frontend/src/pages/biodata/BiodataPage.t: Displays static biodata content including a professional summary and core competencies.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/MyBookingsPa: Shows a user's bookings, login gating, loading states, and renders booking cards with status indicators.
frontend/src/pages/catalog/CatalogPage.t: Lists all dance classes with search, style, and level filters and a hero section.
frontend/src/pages/catalog/ClassDetailPa: Displays detailed information for a single dance class and lists upcoming sessions for booking.
frontend/src/pages/contact/ContactPage.t: Provides a contact form with validation, submission handling, and success/error alerts.
frontend/src/pages/gallery/GalleryPage.t: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/instructor/Instructor: Instructor dashboard showing tabs for managing classes and sessions with dialogs to create new entries.
frontend/src/pages/instructor/ManageLess: Page for instructors to view, add, and manage video lessons with a modal editor.
frontend/src/pages/lessons/VideoLessonDe: Displays detailed information and video player for a selected lesson, with navigation back to the lesson list.
frontend/src/pages/lessons/VideoLessonsP: Lists video lessons with search and style filtering, allowing navigation to detailed lesson pages.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentFailu: Shows a payment cancellation message with options to view bookings or browse classes.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentSucce: Displays a payment success confirmation and refreshes related data, offering navigation to bookings or classes.
frontend/src/pages/testimonials/Testimon: Shows testimonials with category-based filtering and a styled presentation layout.
frontend/src/utils/ics.ts: Utility for generating and downloading ICS calendar event files with properly formatted fields.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, features, requirements, and architectural notes for the dance classes app.
